Title: Object: Papyrus Anastasi 5
Description: Papyrus Anastasi V; sheet 8; Hieratic text. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. 18.1-18.5 I too was once an idle scribe. 18.6-19.2 Fetch the Medjai. 19.2-19.8 Enquiries about two runaway slaves. Unpublished small fragments apparently from this manuscript are now EA 76453.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies 65-67; Caminos, Late Egyptian Miscellanies.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381201) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381201)
